chapter.title: Deploying a &sls; instance to support &rmt; in the public cloud
chapter.para: You can deploy a &sls; instance to support &rmt; in Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud, and Microsoft Azure. The Repository Mirroring Tool (RMT) is included in &sls; starting with version 15.
The following example shows a generic cloud architecture for the &rmt; deployment. Your deployment may look different based on your networking requirements.
